attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: by instigating ethical  Managers [ not corporate directed] who do  case study for  those who cannot access discretion via those on corporate direction , especially Blue Badge Holders who do not look disabled and are not accessing the Social Services. And for every PCN to  show whether a  Blue. Badge is displayed or not [photo]  so unfair bias  is monitored.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
